summary: An email from September 29, 2019, forwarding follow-up information from an interview, including a picture of a middle school directory page showing a phone number and address. The document is marked as subject to a protective order and contains confidentiality disclaimers.

persons.name: USANYS
persons.context: Appears to be a law enforcement official (likely from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York) who requested follow-up information from an interview.

events.title: Follow-up Information Email Sent
events.description: An email is sent forwarding a picture of a middle school directory page containing a phone number and address, as follow-up information from an interview.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated September 29, 2019, containing follow-up investigative information.
It references a picture of a middle school directory page showing a phone number (partially redacted as - 8 8 7 7 7 8 •••••) and an address.
The information is intended for a specific recipient and is marked as confidential and subject to a protective order.
The document is part of the Epstein case records, indicating ongoing investigative activity in 2019.
